title: Caesar Salad
description: A classic salad with crisp romaine lettuce, Parmesan cheese, croutons, and creamy Caesar dressing.
steps: Wash and chop the romaine lettuce and place it in a large salad bowl.
Add Parmesan cheese, croutons, and sliced grilled chicken if desired.
Toss with Caesar dressing until evenly coated and serve immediately.

title: Honey Garlic Wings
description: Deliciously sticky and flavorful chicken wings coated in a honey-garlic glaze.
steps: Arrange chicken wings on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper and bake for 25 minutes.
In a saucepan, mix honey, minced garlic, soy sauce, olive oil, and black pepper. Simmer for 5 minutes.
Remove the wings from the oven, coat them with the honey-garlic glaze, and bake for an additional 10 minutes.

title: Spinach and Egg Quiche
description: A savory quiche with a flaky crust, fresh spinach, and fluffy eggs.
steps: Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C) and place the pie crust in a pie dish.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, heavy cream, salt, and pepper.
Layer the chopped spinach and shredded cheese in the pie crust.
Pour the egg mixture over the spinach and cheese, ensuring even distribution.
Bake for 35–40 minutes or until the quiche is set and the crust is golden brown.
